name: Learn Shapes with Colorful Flashcards - Preschool kids,Toddlers and Babies
name_original: Learn Shapes with Colorful Flashcards - Preschool kids,Toddlers and Babies
description:
“Learn Shapes With colorful Flashcards” is an educational game for young children. A portal to the color; shape world, the app helps to build the skills and knowledge of your child in a playful manner. The young player will be taught to distinguish between different shapes and apply that knowledge in real life.
Features and Advantages of the Game:

We are trying to make learning games for kids with different items in the game – like amphibians and reptiles for better baby education. This game can find place in a list of good kindergarten games for learning figure, number, numerals and color for 2 years old and 3 years old kids. It’s a showtime for distraction and a teaser show of delight and enlightenment for preschooler kids

Thanks,
